Extracted Data.Name: Vindhyavasini
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Data Analyst with 2.5 years of experience in the IT industry, specializing in data analysis, visualization and reporting. Proven ability to work with large datasets, develop insightful reports, and support data driven decision making. Skilled in Power BI, SQL and Python.

Experience.Title: Analytics Consultant
Experience.Description: Developed complex SQL queries to extract and transform large datasets. Improved data retrieval processes by optimizing SQL queries & reducing processing time by 20%. Conducted performance tuning and troubleshooting of Power BI reports and SQL queries to optimize data retrieval and visualization, ensuring alignment with key performance indicators (KPIs) and improving report efficiency. Analyzed and interpreted complex data sets to support business decision making. Developed and maintained dashboards and reports using Power BI. Wrote SQL queries to extract and manipulate data from databases. Collaborated with cross functional teams to identify and address data issues.

Experience.Title: Business Consultant
Experience.Description: Designed, developed, and optimized SQL queries, stored procedures, and views to extract, transform, and load data from multiple sources for accurate reporting and analysis. Developed and maintained Power BI dashboards to visualize key performance indicators (KPIs), trends, and metrics, enabling business units and stakeholders to make data driven strategic decisions. Experience in using Greenplum Database, Teradata SQL Assistant for extracting, optimizing, and analyzing data to generate actionable insights and support decision making through efficient reporting.

Experience.Title: Data Analyst Intern
Experience.Description: Assisted in data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing. Created visualizations and reports to communicate data insights. Supported senior analysts in various data analysis projects. Gained hands on experience with Power BI, SQL, and Python.

Recommendations: Add specific **quantifiable results** to each bullet point in the experience section to demonstrate the impact of your work. For example, instead of saying 'Improved data retrieval processes,' specify 'Improved data retrieval processes resulting in a 20% reduction in processing time'.
Include **soft skills** relevant to the data analyst role (e.g., communication, teamwork, problem-solving) to enhance the overall profile and showcase well-rounded abilities.

Detail any **projects** you have worked on, even personal projects, to further demonstrate your skills and experience with data analysis techniques and tools, including the technologies used and your specific contributions.

Add any relevant **certifications** to showcase your expertise and commitment to professional development in data analysis and related fields. Certifications in Power BI, SQL, or data science would be highly beneficial.
Include information about your **education**, such as degree name, university, and graduation date, to provide a complete overview of your academic background.

In your summary, quantify your accomplishments wherever possible to make it more impactful and highlight your achievements more clearly, like 'Increased report efficiency by X%' or 'Improved data-driven decision making resulting in Y% increase in business outcomes'.
Consider adding a link to your **LinkedIn profile** or a **portfolio** of your work to the contact details section, allowing potential employers to view more of your accomplishments and skills.

RESUME_TIPS: In your experience sections, include specific examples of **inventory planning** activities you've undertaken. Quantify the impact of your **forecasting** on key metrics like reducing **stock outs** or improving **inventory turnover ratio**.

Highlight your experience with **demand forecasting** techniques, such as **ABC classification** or **EOQ**, under your Skills section. Detail how you've applied these methods to optimize **inventory levels**.

In your work experience, mention any experience with **ERP systems** such as **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, emphasizing how you used these systems for **inventory management** and **replenishment**.
Describe your experience in managing **omnichannel inventory**, if applicable. Explain how you balanced inventory across **retail** and **online channels** to meet customer demand efficiently.

Expand on your Business Consultant role by mentioning how your **Power BI** dashboards provided insights into **store performance**. Quantify the improvements achieved in **forecast accuracy** as a result of your analysis.

In your description of SQL skills, include examples of how you used **SQL** to analyze **stock movement** and identify **slow-moving inventory**. Mention any specific **SQL** functions or techniques used.

Within your experience at Quation Solutions Pvt Ltd, describe how you improved **inventory optimization**. Quantify the impact of your work on reducing **overstock percentage** or improving **working capital efficiency**.
Under Technical Skills, include specific forecasting techniques and planning logic you've used, such as **ABC classification** or **EOQ**, to manage inventory more effectively.
In the projects section (if you have one), describe a project where you improved **replenishment** strategies, and quantify the impact on **store fill rate** or other relevant KPIs.
In the experience section, explicitly mention your experience of how you manage **SKU** level data with **Advanced Excel** and **Power BI** to derive actionable insights.

inventory planning.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: How to Optimize Your Inventory
inventory planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to manage inventory effectively, optimize stock levels, and reduce costs with proven strategies.
Understand supply chain analytics, inventory planning, and demand forecasting techniques to improve efficiency.

demand forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn practical demand forecasting methods and techniques to predict future demand accurately.
Gain skills in business forecasting and demand planning to make informed business decisions.
A comprehensive guide to time series forecasting methods and techniques.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Master ABC analysis for effective inventory control and optimization.
Learn how to apply ABC classification to categorize inventory for better management and control.
Simple explanation of ABC Analysis in inventory management

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Understand and apply the Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) model for optimizing order quantities.
Learn to use the EOQ model to reduce inventory costs and improve efficiency.

EOQ.COURSE_NAME: EOQ - Economic Order Quantity formula and explanation
EOQ.DESCRIPTION: EOQ - Economic Order Quantity formula and explanation with examples.

ERP systems.DESCRIPTION: Learn the core concepts of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems and their applications.
Master ERP systems for better business management.
What is ERP? Introduction to Enterprise Resource Planning Systems

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to implement NetSuite ERP for effective business management.
Introduction to NetSuite and its applications in business management.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Master Zoho CRM for customer relationship management and sales automation.
